entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Saskatoon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:19 a.m. CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 18. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or snow beginning early in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023
